text: “Ndikuyankhula kwawo (kwakuti): “Ife tamupha Mesiya Isa (Yesu) mwana wa Mariya, Mtumiki wa Allah; pomwe sadamuphe ndipo sadampachike pa mtanda. Koma adasokonezedwa (ndi munthu wina namuganizira kuti ndi Isa (Yesu). Ndithudi, amene akutsutsana pankhaniyi (Ayuda ndi Akhrisitu) ali m’chikaiko pa iyo; alibe kudziwa kotsimikizika, koma akungotsatira zongoganizira. Ndipo, sadamuphe mosimikiza (kuti ndi iye)
